data.text: Creek, ova here!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Creek, ova here!

data.text:
Okay～ Just give me one moment… I need to put my bag 
into the locker… Ah, everything is spilling out…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Okay～ Just give me one moment… I need to put my bag 
<story>into the locker… Ah, everything is spilling out…

data.text:
Why're you bringin' so much stuff…? Well whatever, 
I'll go on ahead! We'll meet up later!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Why're you bringin' so much stuff…? Well whatever, 
<story>I'll go on ahead! We'll meet up later!

data.text: Brai… Brains… Braaiins…
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Brai… Brains… Braaiins…

data.text:
Woah, the hell's this?! These zombies look like 
the real deal… If I were to 've brought kids here, 
they'd be sure to cry their eyes out…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Woah, the hell's this?! These zombies look like 
<story>the real deal… If I were to 've brought kids here, 
<story>they'd be sure to cry their eyes out…

data.text: Braaaiinnss!!
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Braaaiinnss!!

data.text: Kyaaaa!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaa!?

data.text: Hmm!? That scream just now…
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Hmm!? That scream just now…

data.text:
No… Rice-san's scream would have been much fainter. 
Therefore, I must continue my search.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>No… Rice-san's scream would have been much fainter. 
<story>Therefore, I must continue my search.

data.text: Kyaaa!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Kyaaa!

data.text: Hmm!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Hmm!

data.text: Rice-san!
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>Rice-san!

data.text: B-Bourbon-san!? Kyaa!?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>B-Bourbon-san!? Kyaa!?

data.text: Ouch…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Ouch…

data.text: Tamamo-san!?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Tamamo-san!?

data.text:
S-Sorry bout tha… Huh, Rice!? Wait, Bourbon's here too!? 
Great, I've got somethin' to say to…
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>S-Sorry bout tha… Huh, Rice!? Wait, Bourbon's here too!? 
<story>Great, I've got somethin' to say to…

data.text: (Pling…)
data.processed: <story>(Pling…)

data.text: (Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling)
data.processed: <story>(Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling Pling)

data.text: Wh-What…? What on Earth's goin' on with this thing…!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Wh-What…? What on Earth's goin' on with this thing…!?

data.text: Heh… Hehehe… I found you…
data.processed: <story>Heh… Hehehe… I found you…

data.text: Kyaaaaaa!
data.name: The Group
data.processed: <story>Kyaaaaaa!

data.text:
I've finally caught you♪ 
So don't run away from me anymore.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>I've finally caught you♪ 
<story>So don't run away from me anymore.

data.text: Wait, Cree — What the hell're you wearin'!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Wait, Cree — What the hell're you wearin'!?

data.text:
Hehe, I wanted to use this as an opportunity to check the 
mobility of our costumes. Of course, I brought yours as well♪
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, I wanted to use this as an opportunity to check the 
<story>mobility of our costumes. Of course, I brought yours as well♪

data.text:
If you'd like to change into your costume just let me know. I'll 
be sure to give you a whole buunch of support…♪
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>If you'd like to change into your costume just let me know. I'll 
<story>be sure to give you a whole buunch of support…♪

data.text: S-Something seems off about Creek-san today…?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>S-Something seems off about Creek-san today…?

data.text: Braaaiinss…!
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Braaaiinss…!

data.text: Uwaaah!? That thing's here too!?
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed: <story>Uwaaah!? That thing's here too!?

data.text:
Araara, what a troublesome child… 
Come here…
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Araara, what a troublesome child… 
<story>Come here…

data.text:
Oh, your arm seems all beat up. 
I'll fix it up right away.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Oh, your arm seems all beat up. 
<story>I'll fix it up right away.

data.text: Br… aai… Ma…?
data.name: Zombie
data.processed: <story>Br… aai… Ma…?

data.text:
Hehe, stay still for a little bit. 
Now we can be together from here on.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, stay still for a little bit. 
<story>Now we can be together from here on.

data.text: And I'll be your mama…♪ Hehe.
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed: <story>And I'll be your mama…♪ Hehe.

data.text: Ma… Mamaa… Mamaa…
data.name: Mummy (former zombie)
data.processed: <story>Ma… Mamaa… Mamaa…

data.text:
I'll try my best to be a great mama for everyone today…♪ 
Hehe… Who's a good boy♪
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>I'll try my best to be a great mama for everyone today…♪ 
<story>Hehe… Who's a good boy♪

data.text:
Sh-She… made the enemy into her baby…! With no 
questions asked, she turned her enemy into her baby…!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Sh-She… made the enemy into her baby…! With no 
<story>questions asked, she turned her enemy into her baby…!

data.text:
That outfit seems to have powered her up. 
It's like… a racing outfit….?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>That outfit seems to have powered her up. 
<story>It's like… a racing outfit….?

data.text: So this is the power of costumes…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>So this is the power of costumes…

data.text: The power of costumes?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>The power of costumes?

data.text:
It seems as though even if one originally wore a costume 
for the purposes of becoming a monster, that same costume 
could be used for the purposes of having fun as well.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>It seems as though even if one originally wore a costume 
<story>for the purposes of becoming a monster, that same costume 
<story>could be used for the purposes of having fun as well.

data.text:
Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone 
different from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of 
Halloween, to achieve these desires through a transformation.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Experiencing one's suppressed desires… Becoming someone 
<story>different from oneself… I think that is the true purpose of 
<story>Halloween, to achieve these desires through a transformation.

data.text: That is quite interesting.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed: <story>That is quite interesting.

data.text:
Ah… Well that wasn't an actual quote, it's 
just how I felt while reading that book…
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah… Well that wasn't an actual quote, it's 
<story>just how I felt while reading that book…

data.text:
I have sorted through the collected information regarding 
mission "Joint dormitory Halloween party" and determined 
that the lacking information is located here somewhere.
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>I have sorted through the collected information regarding 
<story>mission "Joint dormitory Halloween party" and determined 
<story>that the lacking information is located here somewhere.

data.text:
Therefore, a new task has been initiated. 
“Circumnavigate the amusement park.”
data.name: Mihono Bourbon
data.processed:
<story>Therefore, a new task has been initiated. 
<story>“Circumnavigate the amusement park.”

data.text:
Huh!? Bourbon, wait up! Let me help you! 
Plus I've got somethin' to tell you!
data.name: Tamamo Cross
data.processed:
<story>Huh!? Bourbon, wait up! Let me help you! 
<story>Plus I've got somethin' to tell you!

data.text:
Hehe… Then I'll go too. 
Allow me to help the two of you♪
data.name: Super Creek
data.processed:
<story>Hehe… Then I'll go too. 
<story>Allow me to help the two of you♪
